name: Guardian Directed Equity Path Portfolio
longDescription: Guardian Directed Equity Path ETF seeks to preserve the value of its investments and provide long-term capital appreciation with reduced portfolio volatility, by investing, directly and indirectly, primarily in global equity securities of high quality companies.. In order to achieve its investment objectives, the Manager primarily uses a fundamental bottom-up approach to security analysis. The Guardian Directed Equity Path ETF maintains a global equity focus and invests primarily in securities of mid- to large-size companies that have a track record of sustained earnings growth.
